title: Smart Data Models - STAT-DCAT-AP Catalogue
description: Catalogue of datasets compliant with STAT-DCAT-AP 1.0.1 specification.

type.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. It has to be Catalogue

dataset.description: Relationship. This property links the Catalogue with a Dataset that is part of the Catalogue. Model:'dcat:Dataset'

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

publisher.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. This property refers to an entity (organisation) responsible for making the Catalogue available. Model:'dct:publisher'

title.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/URL'. This property contains a name given to the Catalogue. This property can be repeated for parallel language versions of the name. Model:'rdfs:Literal'

homepage.description: Property. Model:'foaf:homepage'. This property refers to a web page that acts as the main page for the Catalogue.

language.description: Property. Model:'dct:language'. This property refers to a language used in the textual metadata describing titles, descriptions, etc. of the Datasets in the Catalogue. This property can be repeated if the  metadata is provided in multiple languages.

licence.description: Property. Model:'dct:license'. This property refers to the licence under which the Catalogue can be used or reused.

releaseDate.description: Property. Model:'http://purl.org/dc/terms/issued'. This property contains the date of formal issuance (e.g., publication) of the Catalogue.

themes.description: Property. Model:'dcat:themeTaxonomy'. This property refers to a knowledge organization system used to classify the Catalogue's Datasets.

modificationDate.description: Property. Model:'http://purl.org/dc/terms/modified'. This property contains the most recent date on which the Catalogue was modified.

hasPart.description: Relationship. Model:'https://schema.org/URL'. This property refers to a related Catalogue that is part of the described Catalogue

isPartOf.description: Relationship. Model:'https://schema.org/URL'. This property refers to a related Catalogue in which the described Catalogue is physically or logically included.

record.description: Relationship. This property refers to a Catalogue Record that is part of the Catalogue

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

rights.description: Property. Model:'dct:rights'. This property refers to a statement that specifies rights associated with the Catalogue.

spatial_geographic.description: GeoProperty. This property refers to a geographical area covered by the Catalogue. Model:'dct:spatial'
